updatePlanErrorSimilar: Please select a plan different from the current one
updatePlanToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while modifying your service plan
updatePlanToastSuccessDescription: Your service has been updated with the plan {{newPlan}}
updateVersionErrorSimilar: Please select a different version from the current one
updateVersionToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while modifying your service version
updateVersionToastSuccessDescription: Your service has been updated to version {{newVersion}}
updateFlavorErrorSimilar: Please select a different flavor from the current one
updateFlavorToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while modifying your serviceâ€™s flavor
updateFlavorToastSuccessDescription: Your service has been updated to the {{newFlavor}} flavor

addNodeDescription: You currently have {{nbNodes}} nodes. Are you sure you want to add one? Your bill will increase by <price/> per {{unit}}.
addNodeToastSuccessDescription: Your request to add a node has been processed, and will be effective in a few minutes.
addNodeToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while adding a node
deleteNodeDescription: You currently have {{nbNodes}} nodes. Are you sure you want to delete one? Your bill will reduce by <price/> {{unit}}.
deleteNodeToastSuccessDescription: Your node deletion request has been processed, and will be effective in a few minutes.
deleteNodeToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while deleting a node
